nodes.text: This battle droid was stationed on Count Dooku's Providence-class carrier/destroyer around 21 BBY at the time of the Showdown at Toydaria.

After Savage Opress returned to the ship from his assignment on Toydaria with the body of King Katuunko, Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker followed him and also arrived on the ship in Katuunko's Peregrine-class star yacht, the Thief's Eye. The two encountered resistance from this droid and two others which were destroyed by them shortly afterwards.
The B1 battle droid, like every battle droid in The Clone Wars movie and The Clone Wars TV series, was voiced by Matthew Wood. His name was never given.
